name: post_contraindication_temp
description: Logs a temporary contraindication (injury, illness, travel, etc.) for a client into the Contraindications.temp worksheet via Make.com webhook.

payload_template.description: mild right knee strain after trail run
payload_template.notes: advise light cycling and upper body work only

response_handling.on_success: Right then, contraindication logged successfully for {{client_id}} — {{type}} noted.
response_handling.on_failure: Hmm, looks like the contraindication couldn’t be logged. Let’s double-check the connection or sheet name.
